additional: Includes summary of pertinent details, clearly state problem or theory, including appropriate background and citations.
Methods/techniques are appropriate and properly applied.
Logical, clearly presented, and appropriately summarized.
Presenter has a good grasp of study and related areas and responds effectively and clearly to questions.
Laid out in a manner that is easy to follow and visually appealling.
Work is creative, original, and may have an impact on the field (wow factor).
Feel free to add any comments to the submitted survey (not required).
